rules.content: It’s an artifact with{lns}“{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.”
It's an artifact with{lns}"{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
-X: Sacrifice up to X artifacts. If you do, search you library for that many land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped under your control.

tags.setting: In a bustling marketplace garden, a determined figure sorts through baskets of vegetables looking into the camera, while behind them fertile fields stretch toward a quaint village.
